TopicTitle: Random 1FPS lag and unable to go to space center or click anything until I exit game.

Articles.Content:
Any Idea how to fix this? Its really annoying because I just have to exit the game. It won't let me click space center or do anything.

Edited August 15, 2013 by sokid2k
Give us more info - when does this happen?

I've had this happen to me, though I haven't pinned down exactly what makes it happen.

Sometimes, while building a ship using symmetry and the part clipping cheat, when detaching a section and attempting to place it (with symmetry) it will refuse to let me do so, and drop to a haltingly slow FPS while spamming the output log with hundreds of lines of stuff about null or undefined attachment points.

If you are detaching a section of your craft to try and place it somewhere else with symmetry, if it finds a place it can be connected it will try to put the whole section, with symmetry, right there. And having symmetry will mean the game tries to place the whole section with symmetry around that point. The stack may have gone past a point like this, and it lagged your game and froze it for a bit, even if your mouse has moved elsewhere.
